value:
$WmMPID_舞踏祭オリヴィエ,ch04_03_Olivie_F_dance17,Face|Huh? Where am I? One moment I
was performing a dance at a festival,
but now... I'm here?$k$pHow can I even find everybody...? Sir!
Do you know...?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭シグレ,ch05_32_Shigure_M_dance17,Face|I must apologize, but I don't recognize
this place either. And I fear that the
warriors over there are to blame...$k$pThey must be planning something.
We must stop them! I'll fight with my
mother's pendant...and my song.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_舞踏祭オリヴィエ,ch04_03_Olivie_F_dance17,Face|We lost. How embarrassing...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭シグレ,ch05_32_Shigure_M_dance17,Face|Don't talk that way. We both gave the
fight everything we had... As much as
I detest the idea, we must retreat.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭オリヴィエ,ch04_03_Olivie_F_dance17,Face|Yes...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭シグレ,ch05_32_Shigure_M_dance17,Face|I wonder if the person I'm looking for
is nearby... I feel like she's just around
the corner.$k$p$Sbs150|
